abstract: The News Corporation said Monday that it would sell a controlling stake in three Chinese television stations and a movie library to a private equity fund that was formed with the backing of the Chinese government.
snippet: The News Corporation said Monday that it would sell a controlling stake in three Chinese television stations and a movie library to a private equity fund that was formed with the backing of the Chinese government.
lead_paragraph: The News Corporation said Monday that it would sell a controlling stake in three Chinese television stations and a movie library to a private equity fund that was formed with the backing of the Chinese government, David Barboza reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: News Corp. Sells Stakes in TV Units in China
